verses.verse: וְאֵ֣לֶּה׀ <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei Now these [are] the children הַמְּדִינָ֗ה <WH4082> ham-me-di-Nah, of the province הָֽעֹלִים֙ <WH5927> ha-'o-Lim that went up מִשְּׁבִ֣י <WH7628> mish-she-Vi out of the captivity הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <WH1473> hag-go-Lah, of those which had been carried away אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הֶגְלָ֛ה <WH1540> heg-Lah had carried away; נְבוּכַדְנֶצֹּור ne-vu-chad-netz-tzor כנְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <WH5020> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar Nebuchadnezzar קמֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon לְבָבֶ֑ל <WH894> le-va-Vel; unto Babylon וַיָּשׁ֛וּבוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu and came again לִירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <WH3389> li-ru-sha-Lim unto Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah and Judah אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <WH5892> le-'i-Ro. unto his city

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- These בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> Ba-'u Which came עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel, with Zerubbabel יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' Jeshua נְ֠חֶמְיָה <WH5166> Ne-chem-yah Nehemiah שְׂרָיָ֨ה <WH8304> se-ra-Yah Seraiah רְֽעֵלָיָ֜ה <WH7480> re-'e-la-Yah Reelaiah מָרְדֳּכַ֥י <WH4782> ma-re-do-Chai Mordecai בִּלְשָׁ֛ן <WH1114> bil-Shan Bilshan מִסְפָּ֥ר <WH4558> mis-Par Mispar בִּגְוַ֖י <WH902> big-Vai Bigvai רְח֣וּם <WH7348> re-Chum Rehum בַּעֲנָ֑ה <WH1196> ba-'a-Nah; Baanah מִסְפַּ֕ר <WH4557> mis-Par The number אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> 'an-Shei of the men עַ֥ם <WH5971> 'am of the people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children פַרְעֹ֔שׁ <WH6551> far-'Osh, of Parosh אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children שְׁפַטְיָ֔ה <WH8203> she-fat-Yah, of Shephatiah שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children אָרַ֔ח <WH733> 'a-Rach, of Arah שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah and five וְשִׁבְעִֽים׃ <WH7657> ve-shiv-'Im. seventy ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- The children פַחַ֥ת fa-Chat מוֹאָ֛ב <WH6355> mo-'Av of Pahathmoab לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' of Jeshua יוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> yo-'Av; [and] Joab אַלְפַּ֕יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> she-mo-Neh eight מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> u-she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children עֵילָ֔ם <WH5867> 'ei-Lam, of Elam אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children זַתּ֔וּא <WH2240> zat-Tu, of Zattu תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> te-Sha' nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children זַכָּ֔י <WH2140> zak-Kai, of Zaccai שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְשִׁשִּֽׁים׃ <WH8346> ve-shish-Shim. and threescore ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בָנִ֔י <WH1137> va-Ni, of Bani שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בֵבָ֔י <WH893> ve-Vai, of Bebai שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children עַזְגָּ֔ד <WH5803> 'az-Gad, of Azgad אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> be-Nei The children אֲדֹ֣נִיקָ֔ם <WH140> 'a-Do-ni-Kam, of Adonikam שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> shish-Shim sixty וְשִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <WH8337> ve-shish-Shah. and six ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בִגְוָ֔י <WH902> vig-Vai, of Bigvai אַלְפַּ֖יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim two thousand חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְשִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <WH8337> ve-shish-Shah. and six ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children עָדִ֔ין <WH5720> 'a-Din, of Adin אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- The children אָטֵ֥ר <WH333> 'a-Ter of Ater לִֽיחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> li-chiz-ki-Yah Hezekiah תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> tish-'Im ninety וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בֵצָ֔י <WH1209> ve-Tzai, of Bezai שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children יוֹרָ֔ה <WH3139> yo-Rah, of Jorah מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> u-she-Neim both עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. ten ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children חָשֻׁ֔ם <WH2828> cha-Shum, of Hashum מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim two hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The children גִבָּ֖ר <WH1402> gib-Bar of Gibbar תִּשְׁעִ֥ים <WH8673> tish-'Im ninety וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children בֵֽית־ veit- לָ֔חֶם <WH1035> La-chem, of Bethlehem מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek
אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> 'an-Shei The men נְטֹפָ֖ה <WH5199> ne-to-Fah of Netophah חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְשִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <WH8337> ve-shish-Shah. and six
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei of עֲנָת֔וֹת <WH6068> a-na-Tot, of Anathoth מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The children עַזְמָ֖וֶת <WH5820> 'az-Ma-vet of Azmaveth אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> be-Nei The children קִרְיַ֤ת kir-Yat עָרִים֙ <WH7157> 'a-Rim of Kirjatharim כְּפִירָ֣ה <WH3716> ke-fi-Rah Chephirah וּבְאֵר֔וֹת <WH881> u-ve-'e-Rot, and Beeroth שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei The children הָרָמָה֙ <WH7414> ha-ra-Mah of Ramah וָגָ֔בַע <WH1387> va-Ga-va', and Gaba שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> shesh six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וְאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> ve-'e-Chad. and one ס sa-Mek
אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei of מִכְמָ֔ס <WH4363> mich-Mas, of Michmas מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> 'an-Shei he בֵֽית־ veit- אֵל֙ <WH1008> 'el of Bethel וְהָעָ֔י <WH5857> ve-ha-'Ai, and Ai מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim two hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The children נְב֖וֹ <WH5015> ne-Vo of Nebo חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children מַגְבִּ֔ישׁ <WH4019> mag-Bish, of Magbish מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְשִׁשָּֽׁה׃ <WH8337> ve-shish-Shah. and six ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> be-Nei The children עֵילָ֣ם <WH5867> 'ei-Lam Elam אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> 'a-Cher, of the other אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim two hundred חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children חָרִ֔ם <WH2766> cha-Rim, of Harim שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim. and twenty ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- The children לֹד֙ <WH3850> lod of Lod חָדִ֣יד <WH2307> cha-Did Hadid וְאוֹנ֔וֹ <WH207> ve-'o-No, and Ono שְׁבַ֥ע <WH7651> she-Va' seven מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children יְרֵח֔וֹ <WH3405> ye-re-Cho, of Jericho שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah. and five ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children סְנָאָ֔ה <WH5570> se-na-'Ah, of Senaah שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> she-Lo-shet three אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> ve-Shesh and six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim. and thirty ס sa-Mek

הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim; The priests בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יְדַֽעְיָה֙ <WH3048> ye-da'-Yah of Jedaiah לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit of the house יֵשׁ֔וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a', of Jeshua תְּשַׁ֥ע <WH8672> te-Sha' nine מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im seventy וּשְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> u-she-lo-Shah. and three ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children אִמֵּ֔ר <WH564> 'im-Mer, of Immer אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim. and two ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children פַשְׁח֔וּר <WH6583> fash-Chur, of Pashur אֶ֕לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand מָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim two hundred אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty וְשִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah. and seven ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei The children חָרִ֔ם <WH2766> cha-Rim, of Harim אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef a thousand וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah seven עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> 'a-Sar. teen ס sa-Mek

הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim; The Levites בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- the children יֵשׁ֧וּעַ <WH3442> ye-Shu-a' of Jeshua וְקַדְמִיאֵ֛ל <WH6934> ve-kad-mi-'El and Kadmiel לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei of the children הוֹדַוְיָ֖ה <WH1938> ho-dav-Yah of Hodaviah שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im seventy וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah. and four ס sa-Mek

הַֽמְשֹׁרְרִ֑ים <WH7891> ham-sho-re-Rim; The singers בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children אָסָ֔ף <WH623> 'a-Saf, of Asaph מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <WH8083> u-she-mo-Nah. and eight פ Peh
